content.rendered:
Directed by Vibha Singh

Written by Manish Sharma. Sheilly Sharma. Shelly Sharma

Cast Shruti Haasan (Suhana Roy). Nargis Fakhri (Dance performer). Rajpal Naurang Yadav (Baloo (as Rajpal Yadav)). Tisca Chopra (Asha Roy). Sanjay Mishra (Nautanki Kaka). Sonali Bendre (Avantika Thakkar). Kay Kay Menon (Raj Thakkar). Sugandha Mishra (Ayesha). Upasana Singh (Agaatha (Maid Servant) (as Upasna Singh)). Sudev Nair (Deepak Sethi). Bikramjeet Kanwarpal (Sujeet Roy). Priya Saini. Richa Kalra. Ekta Sharma (Nikita Gehlot). Mahi Sharma. Anshita Sethi. Disha Rajyan. Praveen Ahluwalia. Amrita Sethi

Languages Hindi. English. Tamil. Telugu

Producers Archana Seth. Manish Sharma. Jai Sonker

Production The Rising Stars
